questions.title: 我很抱歉没有等你一起回家。
questions.answer: I'm sorry not to wait for you to come home.

questions.title: 我很抱歉没有陪你走过荒芜的沙丘。
questions.answer: I'm sorry not to accompany you on traversing the deserted sand dunes.

questions.title: 汤姆对我说他很抱歉昨天在教室让你不开心了。
questions.answer: Tom said to me that he was sorry to make you unhappy in the classyesterday.

questions.title: 我很抱歉忘记你的20岁生日。
questions.answer: I'm sorry to forget your 20th birthday.

questions.title: 我很抱歉错过你的表演，因为我整天都很忙。
questions.answer: I'm sorry to miss your show because I was busy all day.

title: ——我很抱歉在你困难时问你借钱。
——没有关系，我有很多钱。

answer.en: I'm sorry to borrow money from you when you are in trouble.
That's all right, I have lots of money.
I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.
That will be OK. Be careful on your way coming.

title: ——很抱歉我不能同意你的意见。
——没有关系，我们应该有个人见解。

answer.en: I'm sorry to disagree with your idea.
Never mind, we should have a personal opinion.
